Room.Name: Milsene Museum's Hall of Doom
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the infamous Hall of Doom, perhaps the most popular part of the Museum. There are a number of exhibits in neighboring rooms.
Room.LongDescription: The Hall of Doom is a magnificent hallway of the greatest terrors ever to be collected into a single exhibit. The hallway continues to the south and back into the main foyer to the north. On the east wing, you see a sign that says "The Undead Aren't Really Dead". On the west wing, you see a sign that reads "Dragons and Brimstone".
